sentences.sContent: These changes basically take a section of the description and encode it into RDF serialization.
sentences.sContent_eng: These changes basically take a section of the description and encode it into RDF serialization.
sentences.sCn: 这些更改基本上是抽取描述的一部分并将其编码为 RDF 序列化。

sentences.sContent: To avoid the overhead associated with using a table, the application could encode the list of items in some string format and have the procedure decode the string to extract the items.
sentences.sContent_eng: To avoid the overhead associated with using a table, the application could encode the list of items in some string format and have the procedure decode the string to extract the items.
sentences.sCn: 要避免使用表的相关开销，应用程序可以一些字符串格式对项目列表进行编码，并使存储过程对该字符串进行解码以便提取项目。

sentences.sContent: For more involved projects you still have to encode at least some of your functions by hand for SWIG to know what to do.
sentences.sContent_eng: For more involved projects you still have to encode at least some of your functions by hand for SWIG to know what to do.
sentences.sCn: 对于更复杂的项目来说，您必须手工编码至少一部分函数，以便让 SWIG 知道该做什么。

trans.tranOther: to put a message or other information into code
